Author: thechex
Title: [ANN][ICO] CHEX Token ** Marketplace Technology, Launched Cannabis Hemp B2B **
Body: There is growing token sale activity actually: https://etherscan.io/address/0xd566fa4a696eac66f749f7fe999d6673fee2026c  It said ICO discount was ending Oct 24 which was our original estimate for when Ethereum block #4555817 (the programmed discount end) would hit, but there were delays on Ethereum's side going from 14 seconds per block to an unexpected 30 seconds per block, bloating our timeline estimates significantly. Here's the block time chart for proof of delays https://etherscan.io/chart/blocktime. They fixed it in the recent hard fork, so our re-estimated Nov extension should hopefully not have another unexpected delay.  I only banned people spamming or marketing other projects in our group. If I accidentally mistook your comment, it was not my intention. What is your Telegram username? Let me see if I cancel ban.  This project is the furthest thing from a scam, and already being realized. I am happy to refund you. Apologies for any misinterpretations, you can message me on Telegram @EugeneLopin

Author: thechex
Title: [ANN][ICO] CHEX Token ** Marketplace Technology, Launched Cannabis Hemp B2B **
Body: Good question - let's take Paragon for example. We're a separate business model with some overlap on the software. Paragon wants to launch initiatives involving software that benefit quality control & patient data etc but also fund various other projects such as industry co-working spaces, legalization efforts, and anything they deem can help the industry. That's all great and may help from different angles.  We have a ready-built and beta launched platform with a core focus on powering Supply Chain Distribution/B2B Exchange, with established industry networks ready to collaborate. There are no other technology development companies in the industry with blockchain platforms targeting the cannabis supply chain exchange specifically. Some are Seed to Sale tracking (inventory management & state reporting) or focused on B2C with software/crypto merchant payments for dispensaries, such as Tokes Platform, who has a very good approach from our conversations that will really help the industry and they are making great progress.  We don't see these companies as competitors, but rather prospective partners, and want to help some of the same important problems as they do such as quality control and trustless seed to sale tracking, and if we succeed to secure critical mass of exchanges happening on our platform, we'll be in a strong position to influence best practice B2B standards that trickle down to the consumer & patient level - endorsing specific labs and additional quality control certifications, introducing supplier product quality COAs as well as a quality control standard for the marketplace, integrating with complementary platforms or developing missing solutions ourselves consistent with our Tech & UX standards, etc.

Author: thechex
Title: [ANN][ICO] CHEX Token ** Marketplace Technology, Launched Cannabis Hemp B2B **
Body: It's a security vs utility token issue. Security tokens need to be registered with SEC. If not registered, US-based ICO's or those selling to US residents better make sure they have a utility token. CHEX is a utility token, but early counsel advised that payment for services with our token (bounty) gives it elements of a security.  Where are you based?

Author: thechex
Title: [ANN][ICO] CHEX Token ** Marketplace Technology, Launched Cannabis Hemp B2B **
Body: CHEX Token  World-class Marketplace & Supply Chain Technology Launched in Cannabis & Hemp Industry   Token Sale Closed - Token Merger executed with Tokes (TKS)   PURCHASE CHEX TOKENS   |   BOUNTY PROGRAM     WHITE PAPER   *          *          *          *          *   WHITE PAPER TRANSLATIONS:    HINDI   |   INDONESIAN   |   VIETNAMESE   |   PORTUGESE   BITCOINTALK ANN TRANSLATIONS:    HINDI   |   INDONESIAN   |   VIETNAMESE   |   PORTUGESE   |   TURKISH   |   SPANISH   *          *          *          *          *   WEBSITE   |   BUSINESS PLAN   |   TELEGRAM   |   ETHERSCAN  REDDIT   |   TWITTER   |   FACEBOOK   |   LINKEDIN   |   MEDIUM   |   YOUTUBE  SUPPORT@THECHEX.COM                                                                                                                                                 [platform developed and launched]   Commodity & Holdings Exchange (CHEX) is modular marketplace software, already developed, to power supply chain distribution and asset exchange platforms. Trading within individual commodity and B2B product industries carries its own idiosyncratic business processes. Individual players within a specific industry also have their own idiosyncratic processes. We have developed The CHEX platform to provide a robust range of tools and feature sets that can be wired and further customized for the needs of any industry. Specifically, through process modularity, we can provide (1) a wholesale storefront for individual businesses and suppliers; (2) a private exchange customized for the needs of business networks; (3) a public exchange to meet an entire industry’s requirements. All platforms are fully featured for enterprise-level needs: marketplace, business management (inventory, customers, orders, user onboarding, etc), process automation (internal, marketing etc), admin controls, delivery & logistics tracking, open API ready, social network (profiles, messaging, user ratings, mobile QR connect, etc), and more.     CANNABIS HEMP EXCHANGE (CHEX) www.TheChex.com  Beta launched in 2017 as the first B2B rollout of the CHEX technology!       Name:  CHEX Token Symbol:  CHX Blockchain/Protocol:  Ethereum/ERC20 Token utility:  Transaction medium with fee waiver + Gamified user rewards + CHEX premium services for users Token price:  1 ETH = 21,000 CHX (after early discount period) Supply:  1,000,000,000 Crowdsale distribution:  95% Crowdsale start:  August 25, 2017 Crowdsale end:  When supply is sold, or we choose to end token sale for strategic reasons and burn unsold token supply Purchase methods:  ETH, BTC, Altcoins (ShapeShift integration)   Cap:  No hard cap - sale ends when crowdsale supply is sold or desired soft cap is reached and we choose to end it (and burn remaining supply of CHEX tokens) Platform developed?  Yes, we began in 2014 and completed an extremely comprehensive foundation in 2017, that is ready for any core B2B exchange use case and further customization for client needs Platform launched?  Yes, powering B2B exchange of commodity & finished products in the Cannabis & Hemp industries first http://thechex.com/, followed by growing interest from people to have us establish marketplaces in other industries Clients and users secured?  Yes, in the U.S, including Producers, Distributors, Manufacturers and Retailers, as well as another Exchange for whom we will power their marketplace platform in via partnership     Commodity & Holdings Exchange (CHEX)   We’ve built a robust set of modules that each contain a generic process and designed all features to be industry agnostic, so as to repurpose and further customize between industry platforms. Examples of developed modules for B2B exchange include product bundling, lot specifications, listing price types (market, limit, auction), order communication channels, order negotiation, settlement, logistics tracking, social and business networking, user ratings, affiliate platform trees, and compliance verification. CHEX Process Modules can be swapped and linked in adaptive ways to expediently onboard a new industry platform and provide all necessary features for a smooth user experience. Piecing these modules together can be wired to solve all idiosyncratic needs of each hard, soft and digital asset sector to optimize B2B exchange as well as to launch other marketplace types (B2C, C2C or P2P, C2B).  The underlying blockchain layer integrates CHEX Token (CHX) into individual exchange platforms to establish (1) a common transaction medium for asset exchange between parties and (2) a distributed, immutable ledger record of verifiable asset holdings and physical inventory tracking.  Furthermore, the CHEX Token model is an economic innovation for buyers and seller to transact more favorably versus established exchange networks, via the gamified CHX Rewards Program. CHEX Tokens will be rewarded to participating users who supply market activity and useful content that boosts an industry’s platform ecosystem via the network effect. Since CHEX Token units serve as a transaction medium on these platforms, the value of rewarded tokens provide a subsidy to all transactions, thereby discounting market buyers and ensuring sellers settle at top market price. This model also merges previously unlinked market makers: Individual broker accounts who may navigate between industries can also earn by affiliating with active market orders to help connect buyers and sellers and facilitate transactions.  The superstructure that CHEX in­tends to create is a unification of isolated industry sectors on a common, blockchain-secured platform. The CHEX ecosystem will power various industry "Pillars", which will be customized according to their unique needs and regulations in collaboration with Industry Ambassadors. The CHEX Token Layer will serve to bind all independent industry exchanges onto the same governing blockchain. Our goal is to scale the CHEX modular platform, blockchain and emerging technologies to upgrade commodity and asset exchange markets by making them more efficient, automated and trustless.   TARGET INDUSTRIES AND USERS:  1.     HARD COMMODITY ASSETS – Metals (Precious, Industrial), Energy, Petroleum 2.     SOFT COMMODITY ASSETS – Agricultural (Grains, Softs), Cannabis, Industrial Hemp, Renewable Energy 3.     DIGITAL ASSETS – Cryptocurrencies, Business Leads (Commercial Mortgage, Merchant Cash Advance, Business Loans, etc), Gaming (MMO Gold, Steam Keys), Music, Art, etc 4.     USERS (B2B) – Producers, Processors, Wholesalers, Distributors, Retailers, Brokers, Double Brokers, Ancillary Services, Market Analysts and Speculators, Regulators      Cannabis Hemp Exchange (CHEX)   Cannabis Hemp Exchange (CHEX) aims to power B2B distribution and wholesale exchange of commodity and finished products in legal Cannabis markets (Marijuana and Industrial Hemp). We provide customized, modern, cross-platform Software as a Service (SaaS) solutions to power white label Wholesale Storefront and Private Exchange platforms, tailored for the business & regulatory needs of licensed businesses in adult use and medical markets.  For maturing commodity market needs, our roadmap is to integrate private client platforms with the ability to ‘push’ excess inventory supply to seed public exchange platforms that we will pilot on regional levels, and match with demand in increasingly anticipated buyer markets; allowing for programmatic transition to centralized marketplace adoption that can provide complete market information, increased business connections and universal exchange standards. We aim to catalyze innovative solutions for B2B best practice adoption in the Cannabis industry with respect to commodity exchange standardization, regional product classification consistency, and sensible quality control standards – the lack of which adversely affect the wellbeing of consumers and medical patients.       WHY CANNABIS?  We chose the fastest growing Cannabis industry back in 2014 due to the infancy associated with its regulatory environment. This gave us, as a technology team, a fresh opportunity to innovate over established processes and inefficiencies common in other industries. We spent almost three years inventing technological solutions for all cannabis, hemp and general commodity and product exchange use cases.  Furthermore, as a nascent industry, Cannabis has lower barriers to entry and provides the opportunity to develop sensible trade standards for the most unique and nuanced commodity in the world. This gives us a chance to improve market price discovery, quality control, and commerce, given the industry’s banking problem, via collaboration with established strategic partners. We aim to secure a Proof of Concept in the Cannabis industry as a springboard to power other asset exchange sectors.     REGULATORY COMPLIANCE  Cannabis industry specific regulatory compliance modules are installed, which only allow verified licensed users in regulated markets to engage in active commerce. Usage of all CHEX cannabis platforms is geo-fenced for intrastate commerce only as required by law. The legality of these regional industries is strictly within the confines of U.S. States’ rights. The U.S. government has defunded federal agency enforcement and States now benefit from regulatory guidelines for legal intrastate cannabis commerce. The CHEX does not touch the plant and simply facilitates B2B connections between licensed parties via software that is fully compliant with all targeted regional regulation.  Regarding cannabis trade and online payments, we have extensive compliance measures in place for state and federal law enforcement. Prospective target partnerships with compliant regional cannabis banks along with companies that service customer acquisition and account management for banks, such as Tokken and KIND Financial, will provide online legal value transfer ability (fiat, crypto, CHX) when counterparties on a CHEX transaction have a bank account. Until then, online transactions for product containing >.3% THC (legal definition of marijuana) are facilitated only up to the order agreement, invoicing and delivery & logistics tracking stages, but financial settlement happens offline in cash. However, we may facilitate e-commerce for ancillary and hemp/CBD based products without THC.  For any insurmountable legal hurdles, we are avoiding rollout of certain technologies. In the meantime, while the industry legally matures, we have built and will continue to build all of the necessary technological architecture in preparation for when regulatory restraints are lifted, and have begun to successfully onboard licensed users. This way, we are firmly positioned for rapid adoption on Day Zero of national and international legal cannabis markets.  Sincerely,  The CHEX, Inc. Author: thechex
Title: [ANN][ICO] CHEX Token ** Marketplace Technology, Launched Cannabis Hemp B2B **
Body: Beta update: We will be working with one of our early Cannabis industry clients - the LIV brand - in the month of October to load their CHEX powered distribution platform with wholesale inventory. Together, we will be presenting it to existing and new customers (retail stores and delivery services in CA) to begin transitioning their manually placed orders to be transacted via the platform (as noted in [ANN] regulatory disclaimer, payment is not yet processed online in compliance with Cannabis laws). In the process, we will gather user feedback and continuously refine the user experience (UX) and features to provide product-market fit.  Our goal is user adoption, and we're providing a premium platform and service (custom development) for free initially. Besides their brand of finished products, the owners behind LIV plan to expand their distribution of other finished and commodity products, having secured Cultivation, Manufacturing, Distribution and Retail Delivery licenses in CA, and our aim is to power their supply chain. Please stay tuned as we provide periodic updates on the progress.  https://enjoyliv.com/
